name: Color
description: Pick a color using color picker

name: HSV to RGB
Mix Colors
code: fn node_{{id}}(a: vec3f, b: vec3f, t: f32) -> vec3f { return mix(a, b, t); }

name: Separate RGB
description: Separate color into R, G, B components

name: Brightness
code: fn node_{{id}}(c: vec3f, b: f32) -> vec3f { return c + vec3f(b); }

name: Contrast
code: fn node_{{id}}(c: vec3f, contrast: f32) -> vec3f { return (c - 0.5) * contrast + 0.5; }

name: Gamma
code: fn node_{{id}}(c: vec3f, gamma: f32) -> vec3f { return pow(max(c, vec3f(0.0)), vec3f(1.0 / gamma)); }

name: Invert
code: fn node_{{id}}(c: vec3f) -> vec3f { return vec3f(1.0) - c; }
